mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM IA_C_CULVERT a
1=1
and a.adcd like #{adcd}+'%'

SELECT
, b.adnm AS "adnm", c.wsnm AS "wsnm", p.pid AS "pid", p.pname AS "pname",p.fpath AS "fpath",p.disc AS "disc" FROM IA_C_CULVERT a LEFT JOIN IA_C_ADINFO b on a.adcd = b.adcd LEFT JOIN IA_C_WATA c on a.wscd = c.wscd left join rel_p_culv d on a.culcd = d.culcd left join IA_P_BASE p on d.pid = p.pid
1=1
and a.adcd like #{adcd}+'%'
and a.culname like '%'+#{culname}+'%'
and a.culcd in

order by a.moditime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IA_C_CULVERT( culcd, culname, wscd, adcd, picid, height, width, typ, lgtd, lttd, signer, audid, status, comments ) VALUES ( #{culcd}, #{culname}, #{wscd}, #{adcd}, #{picid}, #{height}, #{width}, #{typ}, #{lgtd}, #{lttd}, #{signer}, #{audid}, #{status}, #{comments} )
mapper.update: UPDATE IA_C_CULVERT SET culname = #{culname}, wscd = #{wscd}, adcd = #{adcd}, picid = #{picid}, height = #{height}, width = #{width}, typ = #{typ}, lgtd = #{lgtd}, lttd = #{lttd}, signer = #{signer}, audid = #{audid}, status = #{status}, comments = #{comments} WHERE culcd = #{culcd}
